articles.headline: Inside the Winter Wonderland Where Walmart Hatches Its Holiday Plans
articles.snippet: To prepare for ever-longer shopping season, thousands of employees were assembled for a retail jamboree in Florida’s August heat.
articles.abstract: To prepare for ever-longer shopping season, thousands of employees were assembled for a retail jamboree in Florida’s August heat.
articles.lead_paragraph: It felt like calculated chaos inside the chilly convention center where Walmart had recreated one of its Supercenter stores. It was late August in Orlando, Fla., and the retailer had flown in thousands of workers to have a look. They were zipping around, trying to take it all in.
